uovision
Class MapMaker

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--uovision.MapMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class MapMaker
extends java.lang.Thread

Renderes the map view used by MapWindow. This is accomplished by a ring buffer, with wrap around, to improve pefromance.
There is somwhat missing on the algorithm, since one line gets not drawed. The one in which wrap arround occurs. But for now nobody will notice it ;)
